body:
so there is this girl her name is alice i know her my hole life.
and she is the light of my life.
she makes all the sadness go away.
but two years ago I blew it all because I listened to my brothers 
 they let me stuff like stealing and breaking into a house
all of us had to go to the juvenile court
and that felt very scary
I felt  very ashamed that i did this stuff
and she left me for that 
but I have improved myself i did become a better person and i showed that to her we are back together for like 5 months now i feel myself comeplete and i gotta miss her for like 3 weeks so i want to make an nice day for her so any tips what i should do with her give her something ? say something to her? this is my list so far
play soccer 
make her cupcakes

title: any tips for an romantic day at school

replies.body: ye, make her waffles, srsly no joke :D
replies.body_tagged: ye, make her waffles, srsly no joke :D

replies.body:
Get her Subway. 

With all seriousness take her somewhere special (park, go eat outside) after school imo.

replies.body: Just hang out with her, get to know her better, and then when your ready, ask her out, and take her everywhere with you!
